location_working: daily from 10.00 a.m. to 09.00 p.m. in the warm season
location_working_cold: from 10.00 a.m. to 06.00 p.m. in the cold season
location_description: Quad biking through sand or snow drifts for those who crave for excitement and drive. Children and adults velomobiles for leisurely family rides in warm season. Specially equipped track for children mini-cars.
location_description_1: A great idea for quests and thematic activities.
